title: Anyone else have this issue?
body: Last few loading screens have been incorrectly sized for me, they are too small for the client.

replies.body:
Yeah I have been having that issue since {{champion:201}} 's existence.

Or probably earlier than that not sure but it's around that time.

It doesn't really bother me all that much except for it being an eye sore though.
I have this as well, it doesn't bother me too much though, since I can still play the game fine.
